DHCP_Header_t Struct Reference

#include <DHCP.h>

uint32_t Cookie

Detailed Description

Type define for a DHCP packet inside an Ethernet frame.

Field Documentation

uint8_t DHCP_Header_t::BootFileName[128]

Legacy BOOTP protocol field, unused for DHCP

uint8_t DHCP_Header_t::ClientHardwareAddress[16]

Hardware (MAC) address of the client making a request to the DHCP server

IP_Address_t DHCP_Header_t::ClientIP

Client IP address, if already leased an IP

uint32_t DHCP_Header_t::Cookie

Magic BOOTP protocol cookie to indicate a valid packet

uint16_t DHCP_Header_t::ElapsedSeconds

Elapsed seconds since the request was made

uint16_t DHCP_Header_t::Flags

BOOTP packet flags

uint8_t DHCP_Header_t::HardwareAddressLength

Length in bytes of a hardware (MAC) address on the network

uint8_t DHCP_Header_t::HardwareType

Hardware carrier type constant

uint8_t DHCP_Header_t::Hops

Number of hops required to reach the server, unused

IP_Address_t DHCP_Header_t::NextServerIP

Legacy BOOTP protocol field, unused for DHCP

uint8_t DHCP_Header_t::Operation

DHCP operation, either DHCP_OP_BOOTREQUEST or DHCP_OP_BOOTREPLY

IP_Address_t DHCP_Header_t::RelayAgentIP

Legacy BOOTP protocol field, unused for DHCP

uint8_t DHCP_Header_t::ServerHostnameString[64]

Legacy BOOTP protocol field, unused for DHCP

uint32_t DHCP_Header_t::TransactionID

Unique ID of the DHCP packet, for positive matching between sent and received packets

IP_Address_t DHCP_Header_t::YourIP

Client IP address
